column4: I need gpg key for the repo to get e17 in ubuntu. I searched in google, and everywhere I get wget lut1n.ifrance.com, but it is not resolved. Do you tell me where do I get?
if you give me the code that is in the error i can give you the code to fix it
if you run: sudo apt-get update you will see a strig of hex characters, if you give me that i can give you the command
why do you have edgy and feisty repos in your sources file?
